stimulusHtml: Name the speaker in the passage above.

features.html:
When you are asked to refer specifically to the Latin, you must:

  •  write out the Latin and/or cite line numbers

                                          AND

  • translate, accurately paraphrase, or make clear in your discussion that you understand the Latin.

"Tuque, o sanctissima vates,

praescia venturi, da (non indebita posco

regna meis fatis) Latio considere Teucros

errantesque deos agitataque numina Troiae.

(5)  Tum Phoebo et Triviae1 solido de marmore templum

instituam festosque dies de nomine Phoebi."

  1Trivia, -ae, f.: Hecate, sometimes identified with the goddess Diana
